description: Antichains (or order ideals) in the poset 2*2*4*n or size of the distributive lattice J(2*2*4*n)
references: J. Berman and P. Koehler, Cardinalities of finite distributive lattices, Mitteilungen aus dem Mathematischen Seminar Giessen, 121 (1976), 103-124.
G. Kreweras, Les preordres totaux compatibles avec un ordre partiel. Math. Sci. Humaines No. 53 (1976), 5-30.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: J. Berman and P. Koehler, Cardinalities of finite distributive lattices, Mitteilungen aus dem Mathematischen Seminar Giessen, 121 (1976), 103-124. [Annotated scanned copy]
Index entries for sequences related to posets
mathematica: MatrixPower[ ZetaP[ #, n + 1 ][ [ 1, Card[ # ] ] ]&@JofP[ Chain[ 2, 2, 4 ] ] (* This Mathematica program contains undefined functions and at present does not work. *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
